full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DGRA LHA'I BSKANG GSO DKAR PO RGYAL BYED CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES DGRA LHA'I BSKANG GSO DKAR PO RGYAL BYED CES BYA BA 'DI NI RANG GI MCHED GROGS RDO RJE ZHES BYA BAS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR, SNGA MA YOD PA'I YIG CHA BSKANG GSO MA MTHONG BAS GU RU GTER MA DGRA LHA DPANG BSTOD ZHIG LA GZHIR BYAS NAS BKOD PA 'DI NI SNGAGS 'CHANG SMON LAM LHUN GRUB KYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,YI GE PA NI RIG GNAS SKAR RTZIS SOGS DU MA LA MKHAS PA'I RNAM DPYOD CAN BLO BZANG MKHAS MCHOG DBANG PHYUG GO , ,,'DIS KYANG 'GRO BA RNAMS DGE ZHING BDE BAR GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O, ,)
